DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study examine deficit activation motor pattern , well central drive patient rotator cuff tendinopathy . There three specific aim : ( 1 ) determine effect acute pain relief rotator cuff muscle activation patient rotator cuff tendinopathy , ( 2 ) determine effect exercise rotator cuff muscle activation patient rotator cuff tendinopathy , ( 3 ) compare rotator cuff muscle activation patient rotator cuff tendinopathy healthy control .
DOC.brief_title: Neurophysiology Weakness Exercise Rotator Cuff Tendinopathy
DOC.detailed_description: The long-term goal research agenda identify mechanism associate rotator cuff tendinopathy ( impingement syndrome ) subsequently evaluate novel treatment strategy address mechanisms . The objective application study muscle pattern patient rotator cuff tendinopathy well effect pain exercise pattern . Our first hypothesis pain relief shoulder injection result increase rotator cuff activity . Our second hypothesis patient tendinopathy demonstrate improve rotator cuff muscle activity follow six-week exercise program improvement high patient respond favorably treatment . Our final hypothesis patient cuff tendinopathy show decrease rotator cuff activity compare healthy subject . The investigator plan address hypothesis use several novel technique muscle activity assessment .
DOC.criteria: Patient pain passive provocative maneuver ( positive Hawkin 's Neer test ) pain active elevation ( positive painful arc ) pain isometric resist movement ( Jobe 's `` empty '' test resist shoulder external rotation arm side ) demonstrate weakness ( > 10 % force deficit external rotation ) Patient shoulder surgery symptomatic side positive Spurling test traumatic shoulder dislocation instability past 3 month reproduction shoulder pain active passive cervical range motion sign rotator cuff tear ( droparm test , lag sign , gross external rotation weakness , positive image finding ) current musculoskeletal , neurologic cardiovascular compromise Control current previous shoulder injury match age ( within 5 year ) sex meet Patient Exclusion Criteria ( minus musculoskeletal , neurologic , cardiovascular compromise ) Control pain active arm elevation positive Hawkins , Neer , Jobe 's test
